an8.62:4.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant with six qualities is good enough for themselves and others.
an8.62:4.3: A mendicant is smart when it comes to wholesome teachings.
an8.62:4.4: They readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard.
an8.62:4.5: They examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized.
an8.62:4.6: Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly.
an8.62:4.7: They’re a good speaker. Their voice is polished, clear, articulate, and expresses the meaning.
an8.62:4.8: They educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions.
an8.62:4.9: A mendicant with these six qualities is good enough for themselves and others.
an8.62:5.1: A mendicant with five qualities is good enough for themselves and others.
an8.62:5.3: A mendicant is not smart when it comes to wholesome teachings.
an8.62:5.4: They readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard.
an8.62:5.5: They examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized.
an8.62:5.6: Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly.
an8.62:5.7: They’re a good speaker. Their voice is polished, clear, articulate, and expresses the meaning.
an8.62:5.9: They educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions.
an8.62:5.10: A mendicant with these five qualities is good enough for themselves and others.
an8.62:6.1: A mendicant with four qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.
an8.62:6.3: A mendicant is smart when it comes to wholesome teachings.
an8.62:6.4: They readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard.
an8.62:6.5: They examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized.
an8.62:6.6: Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly.
an8.62:6.7: But they’re not a good speaker. Their voice isn’t polished, clear, articulate, and doesn’t expresses the meaning.
an8.62:6.8: They don’t educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions.
an8.62:6.9: A mendicant with these four qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.
an8.62:7.1: A mendicant with four qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.
an8.62:7.3: A mendicant is smart when it comes to wholesome teachings.
an8.62:7.4: They readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard.
an8.62:7.5: But they don’t examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized.
an8.62:7.6: Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they don’t practice accordingly.
an8.62:7.7: They’re a good speaker. Their voice is polished, clear, articulate, and expresses the meaning.
an8.62:7.9: They educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions.
an8.62:7.11: A mendicant with these four qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.
an8.62:8.1: A mendicant with three qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.
an8.62:8.3: A mendicant is not smart when it comes to wholesome teachings.
an8.62:8.4: They readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard.
an8.62:8.5: They examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized.
an8.62:8.6: Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly.
an8.62:8.7: But they’re not a good speaker. Their voice isn’t polished, clear, articulate, and doesn’t expresses the meaning.
an8.62:8.8: They don’t educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions.
an8.62:8.9: A mendicant with these three qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.
an8.62:9.1: A mendicant with three qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.
an8.62:9.3: A mendicant is not smart when it comes to wholesome teachings.
an8.62:9.4: They readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard.
an8.62:9.5: But they don’t examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized.
an8.62:9.6: Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they don’t practice accordingly.
an8.62:9.7: They’re a good speaker. Their voice is polished, clear, articulate, and expresses the meaning.
an8.62:9.9: They educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions.
an8.62:9.10: A mendicant with these three qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.
an8.62:10.1: A mendicant with two qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.
an8.62:10.3: A mendicant is not smart when it comes to wholesome teachings.
an8.62:10.4: And they don’t readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard.
an8.62:10.5: But they examine the meaning of teachings they have memorized.
an8.62:10.6: Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they practice accordingly.
an8.62:10.7: They’re not a good speaker. Their voice isn’t polished, clear, articulate, and doesn’t express the meaning.
an8.62:10.9: They don’t educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions.
an8.62:10.11: A mendicant with these two qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.
an8.62:11.1: A mendicant with two qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.
an8.62:11.3: A mendicant is not smart when it comes to wholesome teachings.
an8.62:11.4: And they don’t readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard.
an8.62:11.5: Nor do they examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized.
an8.62:11.6: Understanding the meaning and the teaching, they don’t practice accordingly.
an8.62:11.7: But they’re a good speaker. Their voice is polished, clear, articulate, and expresses the meaning.
an8.62:11.8: They educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions.
an8.62:11.9: A mendicant with these two qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.”
